messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: 小孩本科毕业想去香港读研究生，想读商学院，帮我整理下26年香港大学、香港中文大学、香港科技大学的相关具体专业（不要mba）、要求和学费（以万港元为单位），方便我们对比这看，弄成一个表格直接给我就可以。然后专业不要那种和外国学校合办的，或者那种双硕士的。中文输出。每个专业分行输出，每行专业对应的学校不得省略。请以一整个Markdown表格的格式输出整理后的数据，不要拆分成多个markdown表格，每个单元格都需要按列名要求输出，不得无故省略，输出采用中文。
表格中的列名依次为：
学校名称、专业、学费、入学要求。不要问我任何问题，只需输出结果，输出格式为```markdown{数据内容}```?

I need to gather specific information about undergraduate graduates' options for postgraduate studies in business administration (not MBA) at Hong Kong universities. I will use search engines to get accurate details.

<search>2026 Hong Kong University Hong Kong Chinese University Hong Kong Technion Graduate Programs Business Administration</search>

Search query: 2026 Hong Kong University Hong Kong Chinese University Hong Kong Technion Graduate Programs Business Administration
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.gs.cuhk.edu.hk/admissions/programme/business-administration):
Business Administration - Programme | Postgraduate Admissions CUHK Business offers high quality PhD and Master's degrees. Its MBA and EMBA programmes are accredited and well-recognised internationally.

[Doc 2](https://masters.bschool.cuhk.edu.hk/cuhk-business-masters-programmes-2026-intake-admissions-open/):
CUHK Business Master's Programmes 2026 Intake Admissions Open Admissions for CUHK Business School Master's Programmes 2026 intake is now open! Start your application first and secure the opportunity to be equipped with ...

[Doc 3](https://masters.hkubs.hku.hk/):
HKU Business School A stepping stone for a prominent future. Encounter our top-class teaching staff and unlock your potential through our far-ranging masters programmes.
<search>2026 Hong Kong University Hong Kong Chinese University Hong Kong Technion Graduate Programs Business Administration requirements tuition fees</search>

Search query: 2026 Hong Kong University Hong Kong Chinese University Hong Kong Technion Graduate Programs Business Administration requirements tuition fees
Result: [Doc 1](https://masters.bschool.cuhk.edu.hk/programmes/mim/admissions/):
Admissions - CUHK Business School Masters The total tuition for new students being admitted in the 2026-27 academic year is HK$405,000 for the whole programme. Tuition can be paid in 3 instalments: 1.

[Doc 2](https://masters.bschool.cuhk.edu.hk/tuitionfee_financialaid_scholarships/):
Tuition Fee, Financial Aid & Scholarships Tuition Fees (2026 Intake) ; Master of Accountancy. Full-time: HK$395,000. Part-time: HK$300,000 ; MSc in Actuarial Science and Insurance Analytics. HK$360,000.

[Doc 3](https://masters.hkubs.hku.hk/articles/tuitionfee):
Tuition Fee - HKU Business School The proposed tuition fee of HKU Business School Masters Programmes for the 2026 intake: The balance will be payable in 2 instalments over one academic year.
